title: Winnie the Pooh Birds of a Feather
brief_description: Rabbit discovers true friendship when a pint-sized baby bird flutters into his life in “Find Her-Keep Her”, in “Donkey for a Day” Piglet gathers the gang together to come up with a plan to make Eeyore happy! In the third all-new adventure “Friend, In Deed”, Pooh Bear mistakenly thinking Rabbit plans to leave the Hundred Acre Wood, goes to incredible lengths to keep his lifelong friend from moving away. Rated: G
